sqlMap.select: select component_code as specializationId, component_description as specializationName from system_table_two where group_code='SPCLCD' and component_code in (SELECT specialization_id FROM program_offered_by where program_id=#programId# and offered_by=#entityId# and branch_id=#branchId# ) and university_code=#universityId#;

select semester_start_date as semesterStartDate, semester_end_date as semesterEndDate from program_registration, university_master um where university_id=#universityId# and status='ACT' and session_start_date=um.start_date and session_end_date=um.end_date and program_course_key=(select program_course_key from program_course_header where program_id=#programId# and branch_id=#branchId# and specialization_id=#specializationId# and semester_code=#semesterCode#) and um.university_code=#universityId# and um.current_status='1';

select pcd.program_course_key as programCourseKey, pcd.course_code as courseCode, cm.course_name as courseName from program_course_detail pcd, course_master cm where cm.university_code=#universityId# and cm.course_code=pcd.course_code and program_course_key in (select program_course_key from program_course_header where program_id=#programId# and branch_id=#branchId# and specialization_id=#specializationId# and semester_code=#semesterCode#);

select distinct ic.program_course_key as programCourseKey, ic.employee_id as employeeCode, ic.course_code as courseCode, (case when ic.status='ACT' then 'Active' else 'Inactive' end) as status, cm.course_name as courseName, concat_ws(' ',em.first_name, em.middle_name, em.last_name) as employeeName from instructor_course ic, course_master cm, program_course_detail pcd, employee_master em where cm.university_code=#universityId# and cm.course_code=pcd.course_code and ic.course_code=pcd.course_code and ic.employee_id=em.employee_code and ic.program_course_key in (select pch.program_course_key from program_course_header pch where pch.program_id=#programId# and pch.branch_id=#branchId# and pch.specialization_id=#specializationId# and pch.semester_code=#semesterCode#);

select program_course_key as programCourseKey, course_code as CourseCode, ic.employee_id as employeeCode, (case when status='ACT' then 'Active' else 'Inactive' end) as status, concat_ws(' ',em.first_name, em.middle_name, em.last_name) as employeeName from instructor_course ic, employee_master em where program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and entity_id=#entityId# and semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and course_code=#courseCode# and status='ACT' and ic.employee_id=em.employee_code;
sqlMap.insert: insert into instructor_course (program_course_key, employee_id, semester_start_date, semester_end_date, insert_time, creator_id, entity_id, course_code, status) values (#programCourseKey#, #employeeCode#, #semesterStartDate#, #semesterEndDate#,now(),#creatorId#, #entityId#, #courseCode#, 'ACT')
sqlMap.update: update instructor_course set employee_id=#employeeCode#, status=#status# where program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and entity_id=#entityId# and course_code=#courseCode#
sqlMap.delete: delete from instructor_course where program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and entity_id=#entityId# and course_code=#courseCode#
sqlMap.select: select ic.program_course_key as programCourseKey, ic.employee_id as employeeId, ic.entity_id as entityId, ic.course_code as courseCode, ic.status, ic.entity_id as entityId from program_registration pr, instructor_course ic where ic.entity_id=#entityId# and ic.status='ACT' and ic.program_course_key=pr.program_course_key and ic.semester_start_date=pr.semester_start_date and ic.semester_end_date=pr.semester_end_date and pr.session_start_date=(select DATE_SUB(#sessionStartDate#,INTERVAL 1 YEAR));

select semester_start_date as semesterStartDate, semester_end_date as semesterEndDate from program_registration where session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# and session_end_date=#sessionEndDate# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and university_id=#universityId# and status='ACT';

select program_course_key as programCourseKey, employee_id as employeeId, semester_start_date as semesterStartDate, semester_end_date as semesterEndDate, entity_id as entityId, course_code as courseCode, status from instructor_course where semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and employee_id=#employeeId# and entity_id=#entityId# and course_code=#courseCode#;
sqlMap.insert: insert into instructor_course (program_course_key, employee_id, semester_start_date, semester_end_date, insert_time, creator_id, entity_id, course_code, status) values (#programCourseKey#, #employeeId#, #semesterStartDate#, #semesterEndDate#, now(), #creatorId#, #entityId#, #courseCode#, #status#);
